subject: Get Timely IGCC and Carbon Management Updates
body:
Gasification News Promotional Letter












Dear Colleague,

            Volatility in the global petroleum and natural gas supply... growing pressure 
            for more efficient power generation... governmental focus on carbon capture 
            without a turnkey technology... increasing corporate demand for added 
            value and bottom-line profitability...

            These and other factors are focusing interest on gasification activity 
            and technologies as never before.

            In the 1990s, gasification capacity increased worldwide by 50%... with 
            forty-three new plants coming online. In just the first five years of 
            the 21st century, capacity increased 58%... with forty-one new plant start-ups. 
            

            The trend is clear. Gasification is the wave of the future and 
            GasificationNEWS 
            is THE publication covering it!

Look what else is happening:


The emphasis on CO2 management and storage is 
              causing sleepless nights... The EU has put the regulatory cart ahead 
              of the process technology horse, and Washington may follow.
Electric power producers are now openly discussing participation 
              in Fischer-Tropsch fuels and chemicals, using Integrated Gasification 
              Combined Cycle to launch...
Oil refiners are starting to make more moves into electric power 
              markets, via coke gasification/IGCC projects...
Chemical producers are now exploring the power and fuels business, 
              using gasification as the market enabler...
Technology providers including GE, Shell, ConocoPhillips and others 
              are forming engineering, procurement and construction (EPC) alliances 
              with major world-wide contractors to offer "wrap" guarantees 
              for gasification projects, cutting risk.

The Bottom Line: 
            The GTL/CTL/BTL/IGCC and chemicals markets are converging around the same 
            nexus... gasification. And this gasification-nexus business is growing 
            explosively, as you'll see in future issues of GasificationNEWS.












            Reported by respected industry journalists and editors, GasificationNEWS 
            provides unbiased, in-depth coverage of the issues that matter to you 
            most. 

            From the latest advances in engineering and plant design... to the nuances 
            of tax incentives and penalties... and from operations and emerging trends... 
            to breaking environmental and regulatory news... 

GasificationNEWS delivers.

            But don't just take my word for it . . . see 
              for yourself in a sample 
                issue.

            In every issue of GasificationNEWS, 
            readers will discover how the major players see future progress in clean 
            energy... AND how they intend to finance projects that start with a ten-figure 
            price tag.

            LATEST DEVELOPMENTS from around the globe...
            Japan... South Africa... North America... China... the Netherlands...
            EXECUTIVE MOVES...
            Snapshots of key market benchmarks...
            GLOBAL HOTSPOTS...

            No other, single publication provides the breadth and depth of information 
            on the convergence technologies that GasificationNEWSdoes.

Who Should Be Reading GasificationNEWS?

            Key players, decision-makers and everyone tasked with achieving the most 
            efficient operation or finding the best path to profitability in CCS, 
            GTL, CTL, BTL, IGCC and Fischer-Tropsch.
